author: nhcwebmaster@noaa.gov (NHC Webmaster)
nhc_headline: ...LIFE-THREATENING STORM SURGE, HURRICANE-FORCE WINDS, AND HEAVY  RAINS CONTINUE ACROSS PORTIONS OF SOUTHERN LOUISIANA... ...600 PM CDT POSITION UPDATE...
summary:
...LIFE-THREATENING STORM SURGE, HURRICANE-FORCE WINDS, AND HEAVY  RAINS CONTINUE ACROSS PORTIONS OF SOUTHERN LOUISIANA... ...600 PM CDT POSITION UPDATE...
 As of 6:00 PM CDT Wed Sep 11
 the center of Francine was located near 29.5, -91.0
 with movement NE at 17 mph.
 The minimum central pressure was 975 mb
 with maximum sustained winds of about 90 mph.

title: Summary - Hurricane Francine (AT1/AL062024)
